OSPRay
A Ray Tracing based Rendering Engine for High-Fidelity Visualization

Projects using / related to OSPRay

This page gives a brief (and incomplete) list of other projects that make use of OSPRay, as well as a set of related links to other projects and related information.

If you have a project that makes use of OSPRay and would like this to be listed here, please let us know.

Projects that use OSPRay

"OSPRay/VTK/ParaView Plugin"

The Remote Visualization Group at the Texas Advanced Computing Center (TACC) is building a OSPRay/VTK/ParaView plugin.

"StingRay"

SURVICE Engineering's "StingRay" toolkit makes use of Embree for simulating radio frequency, and uses OSPRay for visualizing the resuls.

Projects that OSPRay makes use of

  • The Embree Ray Tracing Kernel Framework (embree.github.io)
  • The Intel® SPMD Program compiler (ISPC, ispc.github.io)
  • OSPRay's "sister project" is the OpenSWR software rasterizer, a new high-performance, highly-scalable, software OpenGL implementation that runs on host CPUs.

For information about compiler optimizations, see our Optimization Notice.

http://ospray.github.io
